dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I'll try to blend in with the group and avoid raising suspicion. Let's focus on keeping the villager among us safe and maintaining a normal conversation.

dialogue.message: Based on my investigation, I believe Alice is the assassin. Let's work together to ensure her identification and protect the villager. Bob, please keep a close eye on Alice and report any suspicious behavior to me.
